## Semantisation

::: {.panel-tabset}


### EDTF

Extended Date/Time Format ([EDTF](https://www.loc.gov/standards/datetime/))[^6]

```{=html}
<iframe width="1000" height="500" src="https://www.loc.gov/standards/datetime/"></iframe>
```

### CIDOC-CRM

Use of CIDOC-CRM to map the chronological assumptions

```{=html}
<iframe width="1000" height="500" src="https://historical-time.github.io/caa23/www/thera-cidoc-graph.html"></iframe>
```

Use of SPARQL to retrieve the information


:::

[^6]: ISO 8601-2

::: {.notes}
EDTF is an extension of the previously seen ISO-8601 Date format. It allows an accurate record of time events and durations whatever their fuzzyness (seasons, before, etc.)
:::
